name: .VLW File Extension

description: Font file created by Processing, a program used for making images and animations; saves a collection of glyphs that were converted from another system font (Tools â†’ Create Font in Processing); can be inserted into sketches and animations.

content: Processing can read VLW files using the loadFont() command.
